me sambandhayen ada lankadipa puwath pathata deshapremi kandayame ayikan ekak wana udaya gammanpila upasaka mahaththaya lipiyak sapaya thibuni.hamuduruwan naththam owunuth gas bawa hodakarawama danna nisa porage sitha sahenna ridi atha.ohu palamuwa kiya aththe budun wahanse “mathiwaranan weramani sikkhapadan samadiyami” yanuwen shiksha padayak panawa nathi nisa bhikshun wahanselata mathi sabaya sudusu bawayi.mewani katha kiyaddi mun bauddhayan dayi sithe.heta aniddata budun wahanse shiksha padayak panawa nathayi kiya thawa mokak ho jada wadak kara atha pihida ganimata mowun pasubata nowanu atha.

shri lankiya aarthikaye sanwardhanayata dayada kerena mema prawikirana yanthragaraya aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahathage pradhanathwayen wiwrutha kirimata niyamithayi.me yanthragarayehi sampurna wikirana dharithawa kilo kiyuri 3,000 k wana athara ema dharithawa bhawitha kota gama prawikirana sewa sapayima mangin masakata rupiyal miliyana 4.5 ka aadayamak upayagatha hakiweyi.shri lankiya adhi thakshanika kshethraye nawa pituwak peralamin biyagama aayojana kalapaye sthapanaya karanu labu bahukarya gama prawikirana yanthragaraye wanija meheyum katayuthu arambaimata siyalla sudanam kara thibena athara waidya, krushikarma athulu kshethra rasaka sanwardhanayata ruju dayakathwayak gama prawikirana sewawa osse labagatha haki weyi.nawa karmantha arambaimata, nawa rakiya awastha bihiwima menma sulu ha madhya parimana karmanthakaruwanta gama prawikirana thakshanaya aashritha karmantha aarambha kirimata memangin awasthawa himi weyi.
